text: this is Danny hi and this is Ellen hi
and they are my sweet loving parents
[Music]
I've spent the past two weeks with them
in Hong Kong how many said to me walk up
a couple hundred steps Macau they're
amazing
Bali it's pretty pretty cool Phuket and
now we're in Bangkok it's the third time
visiting me in Asia after coming to
South Korea in 2014 and then the
Philippines in Vietnam last year is just
so cool
we just love Asia I wanted to make a
video about my parents to explain how
thankful I am to have these amazing
people in my life my mom sacrificed her
teaching profession for 18 years just to
make sure that myself and my two sisters
were raised well my dad took several
weeks off work every year to take me
around the US for competitive hockey
tournaments my parents have allowed me
the opportunity to attend a great
college and study abroad they have
supported me since day one to follow my
heart even if sometimes I stressed them
out while traveling really do you like
North Korea I owe everything to these
two people in my life and I never miss a
beat to say I love you it's important to
realize that you only exist because of
your parents and they have the hardest
job in the world raising you since birth
I want everyone watching this to call
their mom or dad out of the blue right
now and say hi wish them a Happy New
Year ask them how their day is going
even if you haven't spoke to them in a
while or if you're on bad terms you
should always be more appreciative
because everything you have in your life
is because of their decision to have you
and for that I am forever grateful
[Music]
